org.springframework.kafka.listener

接口 BatchErrorHandler

  • 所有超级接口:
    GenericErrorHandler<org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecords<?,?>>
    所有已知子接口:
    ConsumerAwareBatchErrorHandler, ContainerAwareBatchErrorHandler
    所有已知实现类:
    BatchLoggingErrorHandler, ContainerStoppingBatchErrorHandler, SeekToCurrentBatchErrorHandler

    public interface BatchErrorHandler
extends GenericErrorHandler<org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecords<?,?>>
    Handles errors thrown during the execution of a BatchMessageListener. The listener should communicate which position(s) in the list failed in the exception.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.1

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.kafka.listener.GenericErrorHandler

        handle, handle
